title: 60's Rock Legends
creator_credit: Peter Clifton, World Film Services and John Heyman
brief_description: During the second half of the sixties and into the seventies, Peter Clifton took his cameras and crew from Hyde Park to the Paris Olympia. He was afforded a rare insight into the inner workings of the most explosive phase of rock history. The video includes clips from the Rolling Stones, Jimi Hendrix, Pink Floyd and many more.
